notes.scm:Note: Detect changes to AssemblyClass definitions for elements to trigger page recompilation.
OnPrepare element triggers an expression when the Prepare message is received
Support the use of generic components in textgen trees.
Minor refactoring to support debugging
spiralcraft/textgen/elements now inherits from a standard spiralcraft/app/components library
Implement Dispatcher.getForwardPath()
Report source channel info in exception thrown when input is not iterable.
Fix NPE getting code position
Allow option to automatically publish an element's self reference as a constant and add aliases for all declared types into the element's DeclarationInfo.
Use vfs packages to resolve included resources
Attribute values in tgl files are now scanned for contextual substitutions
ElementState updated for State interface update expanding localId contract.
Element now implements Reflectable and Declarable
Fixes- Allow the default namespace in .tgl and .webui files to be set using tgns="uri" to allow for extensions of the class:/spiralcraft/textgen/elements package.
Allow the default namespace in .tgl and .webui files to be set using tgns="uri" to allow for extensions of the class:/spiralcraft/textgen/elements package.
The Theme overlay system now uses the vfs Package system to resolve resources through overlays.
Added experimental feature to construct an element using the "textgen:x" attribute instead of using the default constructor for the underlying Java class/Assembly
Theme overlay system to allow for a set of resources to override or customize a base set. This is experimental.
New Text element to wrap a spiralcraft.text.MessageFormat to render formatted strings that will accommodate future i18n capabilities.
Make bind() and message() final to increase the utility of the base Element class and the re-usability of future changes.
Changes to Scaffold interface and further genericization of related methods to migrate textgen closer to the spiralcraft.app Component model.
Add onBind expression hook to Element and bindComplete() method hook
Implement child registration by id in Element
Allow option to ignore bind error for components that depend on functionality not always available.
Add subscriptions and notifications model in required by enhancements to the spiralcraft.app.Component interface.
Element.expandChildren() throws ContextualException
PrepareMessage has a singleton instance to reduce the amount of generated garbage.
Routes to component states are now represented by a Sequence instead of an int[]
Recompile due to changed Declarable interface
The namespace context of the referencing component must be used when a reference to a visual component (.tgl) passes in attributes to be used as parameters.
Namespace prefix definitions no longer leak across document boundaries.
Add location detail when an error occurs evaluating an expression using the <%=expr/%> syntax
"Out" element is now extendable to support the use of context specific encoders.
Update for minor changes to spiralcraft.app.MessageHandler and spiralcraft.app.Component
Wrap an ElementRuntimeException in another instead of appending to the caught exception.
Handle messages that should not affect the state frame, such as the InitializeMessage
InitializeMessage subsumed into spiralcraft.app.InitializeMessage
The textgen:trim setting is inherited within the same doclet until it is turned off
FocusElement supports writeThrough mode
Add traceability to ThreadLocalChannels in Iterate element
Format now uses the subject of the Focus chain when no 'x' property is specified.
Freeze Structs used for bind-time Element contexts to ensure that members are constant so member values can be passed to nested components
Fix position reporting in exceptions when reading tag attributes
Ensure that Channel metadata is propogated through various Elements
Fix @include not seeing local namespace prefix decls.
Whitespace trimming using the "textgen:trim" attribute has been redefined to trim only beginning and end of the content contained in the element.
"tgns:" attributes can be used with property tags.
A .tgl file can now be referenced as a component using a tag name.
The optional "@doclet" outer processing unit allows setting of attributes and properties for the Doclet itself.
Pull Element AssemblyClass declaration info when RuntimeException occurs
All units are constructed with a reference to the TglCompiler to provide access to source position and other contextual info
Use of scaffold binding context now generalized into TglUnit as attribute textgen:contextX
InsertUnit can now reference resources as components
All units now accept properties
Add a toString() method to ElementState
ElementState always indicated that the frame changed
Include source code location in log messages from Elements.
Make sure Element re-throws ContextualException during bind to include source code context.
"Session" element has an onStartX property to evaluate an Expression on session start.
"With" element uses Contextual list instead of overriding bindImports()
MessageHandler implementations have moved to spiralcraft.app.kit
StateFrame change detection moved into the core spiralcraft.app.State api and the Dispatcher
OnFrame element evaluates an expression on StateFrame change
"Out" element supports a StringConverter and is based on spiralcraft.lang.util.ExpressionRenderer
Element has addXXXContextual/removeXXXContextual internal methods similar to spiralcraft.app.kit.AbstractComponent.
FocusElement calls appropriate methods in Element instead of calling super.bind()
Added basic XML tag/element rendering functionality
Don't add null alias to Focus in FocusElement
Added basic XML tag/element rendering functionality
Refactor API to move closer to spiralcraft.app model
Element now implements spiralcraft.app.Component, and EventContext now implements spiralcraft.app.Dispatcher
Replace EventContext.getOutput() with OutputContext ThreadLocal
Replace Element.render() method with RenderMessage
message() no longer has a "path" parameter now that the EventContext (dispatcher) tracks it.
Message and ElementState now implement spiralcraft.app counterparts.
Core Refactor: widen lang.Contextual to throw ContextualException instead of BindException.
Scaffold for TglUnit now throws ContextualException
Core refactor: package spiralcraft.app.spi moved to spiralcraft.app.kit
"Out" element to output of result of expression.
Support parameterized Inserts using attributes and contextX property of Define.
Support using bind-time expressions for attribute values with "$" attribute prefix.
FocusElement extensibility improvements to support recompute and frame change triggers
Session extension of "With" Element to support value persistence as default behavior.
Names for inserts and defines can now be qualified with namespace prefixes.
spiralcraft.common.namespace.QName is now used to represent qualified names.
StateFrame change detection has been promoted to base ElementState class.
Refactor to migrate closer to common component model in spiralcraft.app package
Signature of Element.bind is now almost identical to spiralcraft.app.Component.bind, and Element has no-arg constructor.
Signature of TglUnit.bind now conforms to Scaffold.bind. Element now uses Scaffold interface to supply children.
Element supports the use of inner and outer Context chains to allow for more generic expression of component functionality.
The "With" component now uses the new ChannelBuffer class to handle the refresh trigger.
Use Appendable in leiu of Writer where applicable to increase portability
Provide a Decimal formatting element
Refactor common DateFormat, DecimalFormat logic to base Format element.
Provide an element for declaring a constant reference that is published at bind time.
Create shorthand for comment as <%!%> ... <%/!%>
Provide source code context for RuntimeExceptions
Sync with core 0.4.12
Ensure that textgen property elements containing plain text also receive the contextual prefix resolver
[SCPUBLIC-40] Skinning mechanism should support exports from @defines at any level
All defines are late-binding
Remove redundant define lookups slowing down page compilation.
Lowercase tag names with no namespace prefix are always interpreted as fragment names and not Elements to avoid searching for Element and failing when a fragment is not found.
Fix NPE when an imported define is not resolved.
Processing units correctly report position
[SCPUBLIC-29] Namespace definitions should be exclusively document-scoped
[SCPUBLIC-33] Improve facilities for skinning and UI markup re-use
[SCPUBLIC-35] Elements should be referenceable in the focus chain by the URI used to instantiate them
Internal refactoring of composition and binding pattern to move towards compatibility with generalized component model.
Focus is now transmitted through the bind() call tree instead of being pulled from the hierarchy.
Sync with core 0.4.10
Removed spiralcraft.registry package and all dependencies
"Generate" scenario returns a result, no longer requiring a location to push output to.
"Render" ChannelFactory renders a template from input data
Provide hold and trigger key functionality to "With" element via holdWhileX and triggerKeyX properties.
Internal interface change to rename compute() method to computeExportValue()
Fixed deprecated lang syntax in GroupFooter and GroupHeader
Ensure that ResourceUnit auto-initializes for a resource with an unavailable lastModified time
Sync with core 0.4.8
spiralcraft.sax.SaxPrefixResolver changed to spiralcraft.common.StandardPrefixResolver
spiralcraft.vfs.AbstractResource changed to spiralcraft.vfs.spi.AbstractResource
spiralcraft.lang.FocusChainObject changed to spiralcraft.lang.Contextual
spiralcraft.lang.ThreadedFocusChainObject changed to spiralcraft.lang.ThreadContextual
Sync with core 0.4.4
Fix NPE: Insert no longer chokes when it is used outside of an Include.
Refactor for Namespace->PrefixResolver refactor. Use new spiralcraft.common.namespace package.
Include component now accepts namespace qualified resource names.
Refactor for Scenario signature change
Refactor for deprecated CompoundFocus
Added outputUriX binding to Generate scenario to allow output to a resource.
Fix issue with nested @includes, where an @insert binds to the wrong include, creating an infinite loop.
New "Generate" scenario for incorporating text generation into task chain
Fix NPE when no @namespace element has been declared but a namespace is used in a document, resulting in a situation where the namespace resolver is null.
Allow any Assembly to be put into the page context. FocusChainObjects/ThreadedFocusChainObjects will be automatically bound and threaded, and Lifecycle elements will be automatically started.
Added logging to note when ExpressionFocusElements recompute their value.

Fixed bug where a FocusElement erroneously starts the frame and computes and caches the bound value in Initialize event. Modified to defer initial computation and frame start to events after Initialize.
DateFormat tag uses current time if no expression is provided
Trap tag syntax error- chars after last attribute in Markup element tags.
ArrayUtil signature change (generics) from core
Make the referenced object in SharedReference the default Focus for any contained objects.
Implementing StateFrame mechanism to better synchronize state changes.
Refactor for AbstractXmlObject.create() change
